title: Cheesman Park in your back yard!
posting_body: Want to have the best of both worlds, then 1303 Columbine is the place to be.
Perfectly located between Capitol Hill and Cheesman Park, this highly desired location is the best of Denver.
Hardwood floors and granite countertops are sure to impress while residing in a prime location.
